welcome_message_body: Welcome to beautiful Swampscott, a charming coastal town known for its stunning views, historic landmarks, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Beverly Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights, offering amenities for passengers and crew.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The primary terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serves mainly domestic flights and is also home to the airport's largest airline, JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves mainly international flights and is also home to the airport's largest airline, Delta.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: The international terminal, serving mainly international flights from non-US carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout all terminals.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial and private flights at Hanscom Field Airport.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private aviation services and caters to the needs of private jet travelers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free. Network name and password can be obtained at the information desk.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lawrence Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
